docs.snippet: Phineas, a Labrador retriever, had been placed in quarantine after being accused of biting a girl but vanished twice and mysteriously reappeared....
docs.lead_paragraph: Phineas, a Labrador retriever, had been placed in quarantine after being accused of biting a girl but vanished twice and mysteriously reappeared.
docs.abstract: Case of Phineas, Labrador retriever that was to be euthanized after being accused of biting a child, has gripped the community of Salem, Mo; judge finally dismissed case, ruling that Phineas was not guilty of biting; dog remained in hiding until finally being reunited with his grateful family.

headline.main: Dog’s Tale: From Death Row to Doorstep
headline.print_headline: Dog’s Tale: From Death Row to Doorstep
